text: Rough Night in Jericho is a 1967 American western movie. It was directed by Arnold Laven. The movie is based on the novel The Man in Black by Marvin H. Albert, who also wrote the screenplay. It stars Dean Martin, George Peppard, Jean Simmons, Steve Sandor, and Don Galloway. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1967 movies Category:1960s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Arnold Laven Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Rough Night in Jericho
